sentences.sContent: She was on her hands and knees scrubbing the floor.
He scrubbed the dirt off his boots.
sentences.sCn: 他把靴子上的脏土擦掉。

sentences.sContent: The table needs to be scrubbed clean .

synos.tran: 矮树；洗擦；擦洗者；矮小的人（或物）
矮小的；临时凑合的；次等的

remMethod.val: 和rub(v. 擦， 摩擦)一起记

words.tran: [化工] 洗涤器；洗刷者；刷子
擦洗；废止；揉搓（scrub的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to rub something hard, especially with a stiff brush, in order to clean it
low bushes and trees that grow in very dry soil
